sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都指"拥有权力或统治权的人"。
means: chief ： 最广泛用词，上可指最高统治者，下可指顶头上司，即可指任何一级的头头。
head ： 多指一个机构或团体等的负责人或最高首长。
leader ： 指国家、民族、政党、组织等的领导或领袖。强调领导能力、含有能够引导、指导、控制被领导者并获得其支持的意味。
boss ： 非正式用词，多作口语用，可指任何负责人，也可指经理、老板或工头。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家

command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官

employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者

entry.def: The leader of a group of people or an organization is the person who is in control of it or in charge of it.

example.ex: We now need a new leader of the party and a new style of leadership...
example.tran: 我们现在需要一位新的政党领袖和一种新的领导作风。

example.ex: We are going to hold a rally next month to elect a new leader.
example.tran: 我们打算下月举行集会，选举一位新的领导人。

entry.def: The leader at a particular point in a race or competition is the person who is winning at that point.
entry.tran: （比赛或竞赛中的）领先者，占先者

example.ex: The leaders came in two minutes clear of the field...
example.tran: 优胜者较其他参赛者快两分钟。

example.ex: The world drivers' championship leader crossed the line ahead of the Swede.
example.tran: 在世界车手锦标赛上，领先选手比瑞典人快一步冲线。

entry.def: The leader among a range of products or companies is the one that is most successful.
entry.tran: （产品或公司中的）首屈一指者，佼佼者

example.ex: Procter & Gamble is the leader in the mass market cosmetics industry.
example.tran: 宝洁是大众化妆品行业中的领头羊。

entry.def: The leader of an orchestra is the most senior violin player, who acts as a deputy to the conductor.
The leader of an orchestra is the conductor.
A leader in a newspaper is a piece of writing which gives the editor's opinion on an important news item.
A leader in a newspaper is the most important story in it.
